heartbeat_create_user.description: Create a new user in a Heartbeat community

props.name: email
props.description: The user's email. Must be unique to the community

props.name: role_id
props.description: The role the user should have

props.name: group_ids
props.description: A list of the ids of the groups that the user should belong to.

props.name: profile_picture
props.description: A Data URI scheme in the JPG, GIF, or PNG format. Ensure you use the proper content type (image/jpeg, image/png, image/gif) that matches the image data being provided

props.name: linkedin
props.description: A link to the user's LinkedIn profile

props.name: twitter
props.description: A link to the user's Twitter profile

props.name: instagram
props.description: A link to the user's Instagram profile

props.name: create_introduction_thread
props.description: If true and a value for bio is provided, an introduction thread for the user will be created in the channel designated for introductions in your community settings.
